text: Lady and the Tramp is a 2019 American live-Acton musical romance movie of talking dogs with CGI moving mouths directed by Charlie Bean and written by Andrew Bujalski and Kari Granlund. It was produced by Walt Disney Pictures and Taylor Made. The movie is a live-action and CGI version of Walt Disney’s 1955 animated movie of the same name. The movie stars the voices of Tessa Thompson, Justin Theroux, Janelle Monáe, and Sam Elliott with the human characters played by Thomas Mann, Kiersey Clemons, Yvette Nicole Brown, F. Murray Abraham, Adrian Martinez, and Ken Jeong. Lady and the Tramp was released on November 12, 2019 on Disney+. ==References== Category:Lady and the Tramp Category:2019 romance movies Category:2019 musical movies Category:Disney movie remakes Category:2010s American musical movies Category:2010s American romance movies
title: Lady and the Tramp (2019 movie)
